name: Wound of the West
description:
- Rewrite US history during 1860s - 1890s!
- Playing as Natives or USA in a rare western RTS game!
- Playing among 2 Factions: US Settlers or Native American
- More than 10+ unit types for each side
- More than 10+ buildings for each side
- Playing as campaign or single map
- Map editor included
- English language only
- 3D low-polygon graphics
- Desert, Snow, Prairie and Grass Themes

I developed this game following my inspiration of reading the book called "Bury my heart at Wounded Knee" 20 years ago.
This game will cover the last 30 years of conflict as the book portrayed.
